evidence_in_dialogue: [[Grissom]] why would a guy shoot a man three times and then strangle him with his own tie ?
[[Grissom]] any more bodies you want to tell me about ?
[[Grissom]] i should have looked deeper into ben 's character
[[Brass]] my guy in the hotel lounge tells me that tina and shelley were having a catfight over some dude named jeremy the day she died
[[Roger]] bystander gets a little too nosy
[[Tina_Kolas]] i did n't mean to kill her
